__e: Why can't you come clean with me?
Oh, well, you was always square with me, so it's fifty-fifty and nobody owes nobody nothing, do they?
You know, he was always all right to me, you know... and now I can't do nothing to help him?
I'm not saying i'm perfect, but i do the right thing by my family.
And... because I'm an equal-opportunity kind of guy, you've got till the end of the week to clear out your desk and leave.
Out on the street, you and me- you coming down one side of the street, me coming down the other.
